entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT bad code gen for constrained call #99198
    9.0.0
  • The Syndication DateTimeHelper class throws an exception on some valid RFC822 dates #99193
  • [9.0-preview.1] Test process crash on Windows in Release mode with task throwing an exception #99187
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer - replace copy loop with span.CopyTo(destination) #99186

Closed

  • Running tests tries to run .NET Framework tests with mono on non-Windows #81395
    Future
  • ValidateEnumeratedItemsAttribute does not validate Dictionaries #97873
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add managed API surface area for ByRefLike Generic constraints #68002
    9.0.0
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers. #93890
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel client-user and pipeline types #97711
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • More SearchValues<string> tests #99197
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • DivRem 64by32 and 32by16 refactor in Decimal.DecCalc #99196
    needs-area-label
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the Syndication Feed RFC822 DateTimeParser #99194
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    needs-area-label
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Expand small value sets to all case permutations in SearchValues<string> #98902
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Skip long values when building Rabin-Karp buckets in SearchValues #98901
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use VN instead of GenTree in optGlobalAssertionIsEqualOrNotEqual #99182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GC hole in Guid #99138
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-reliability
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • SPMI: Expand PerfScore output #99158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Disable optimizations for b425314.dll test #99170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
